I agree there. I'd appreciate it if you used more creative insults, 
Alten, like "Son of a toaster oven" or something. At any rate, cut 
down on the human swearing. Thanx.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: And it blinded me! (Cries) And it made me deaf! Now I'm Dead 
Eye Dick from the Desperadoes! (He cain't hear, and he cain't see, 
neither! Now what are we gonna do about that?) So I plead, no more 
useless swearing, please!...
